SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Assets

Class CacheSoundEffect

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Assets.CacheSoundEffect
public class CacheSoundEffect extends Object
CacheSoundEffect class manages cache of MediaPlayer instances for sound effects in order to optimise game performance by reusing the existing MediaPlayer objects instead of creating new ones for every single playback.

  • Constructor Details

      public CacheSoundEffect(AudioAssetLoader audioAssetLoader)

      audioAssetLoader - : AudioAssetLoader used to load audio assets.

  • Method Details

    • getMediaPlayer

      public javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer getMediaPlayer(String audioName)
      Retrieves MediaPlayer instance for specified sound effect. If MediaPlayer is available in cache, it's then reused. Otherwise, a new MediaPlayer is created and then configured.
      Parameters:
      audioName - : Name of sound effect to retrieve the MediaPlayer for.
      Returns:
      A MediaPlayer instance for sound effect or null if audio asset fails to load.

    • playSoundEffect

      public void playSoundEffect(String audioName, double volume)
      Plays specified sound effects at given volume. If a MediaPlayer is available in cache, it's then reused. Otherwise, a new MediaPlayer is created and then played.
      Parameters:
      audioName - : Name of sound effects to be played.
      volume - : Volume at which to play the sound effect.
